review: Overall excellent, easy to set up. But two quibbles: a cluttered on-screen interface; and remote control is sleek, but at the expense of easy opening to insert batteries.
author: Don Hogsett at dhogsett@cahners.com

review: This replaced an entire laptop that I had dedicated to streaming media.
author: Kevin Cheatham

review: Works like a champ and cost me 20 bucks on sale!
author: zoso "zoso"

review: Works well withthe amazom and paid products. To stream something from my Ipad or Iphone I gave up after one hour trying and used Chromecast that works fine for casting from the mobile to the tv. dissapointed.
author: Robert Morgenthaler

review: Set up way too complicated. I finally got netflix to work after 4 hours cursing.
author: Jack Musgrove

review: Better than Google Chrome we own both. Like that it comes with a remote and can function on its own with a app. It has lots of games and apps to choose from.
author: Kendrick Cross

review: Very easy to set up and use.
author: Sandra K. Schafer
